news.title: Colin Farrell to be honoured at Zurich Film Festival next month
news.summary: Farrell's film Ballad of a Small Player comes out in Irish cinemas on October 17, followed by a Netflix release on October 29

news.title: KNEECAP broadcasts message to Sziget Festival after ban from Hungary
news.summary: "We must stand together," the message read. "Oppose Orbán. Oppose Israel. Oppose genocide."

news.title: Niall Breslin announces new album The Place That Has Never Been Wounded
news.summary: The record comes out on October 24 via INNI.

news.title: KAYTRANADA announces new album AIN’T NO DAMN WAY!
news.summary: The new record comes out this Friday, August 15 via RCA Records.

news.title: Irish Artists For Palestine launch fundraising packages for Daughters Of Jerusalem choir's upcoming Irish concerts
news.summary: Anyone who chooses to purchase a fundraising package has the opportunity to be listed as a featured sponsor on tour materials

news.title: Taylor Swift announces new album The Life of a Showgirl
news.summary: Find more information about the new album below.

news.title: sombr announces debut album I Barely Know Her
news.summary: The record is due out on August 22 via Warner Records.

news.title: On this day in 1991: Metallica released their iconic self-titled LP, better known as The Black Album
news.summary: On this day in 1991, Metallica released their classic self-titled fifth album, commonly known as The Black Album. Featuring tracks like 'Enter Sandman', 'The Unforgiven', and 'Nothing Else Matters', the acclaimed LP went on to become one of the best-selling albums of all time...

news.title: Just Mustard announce new album We Were Just Here and Olympia Theatre date
news.summary: The title track 'We Were Just Here' is out now, check it out below.

news.title: Brògeal share new video for ‘Go Home Tae Yer Bed’
news.summary: The single is taken off of their upcoming debut album Tuesday Paper Club, out October 17.
